plot: Pastors Steven L. Anderson and Roger Jimenez preach against the popular teachings of a pre-tribulation rapture, which they consider to be false. Anderson also talks on the phone with Kent Hovind who is in prison.
title: After the Tribulation
plot_es: Pastors Steven L. Anderson and Roger Jimenez preach against the popular teachings of a pre-tribulation rapture, which they consider to be false. Anderson also talks on the phone with Kent Hovind who is in prison.
plot_en: Pastors Steven L. Anderson and Roger Jimenez preach against the popular teachings of a pre-tribulation rapture, which they consider to be false. Anderson also talks on the phone with Kent Hovind who is in prison.
